mapper.select: select user_code customerCode, user_acct customerAcct, user_password customerPassword, user_name customerName, sex, tel, mail, idcard, version from t_sys_user where is_delete = 0 and user_code = #{customerCode}

select user_code customerCode, user_acct customerAcct, user_password customerPassword, user_name customerName, sex, tel, mail, idcard, version from t_sys_user where is_delete = 0
and user_code like concat('%', #{customerCode}, '%')
and user_name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
order by user_code
